content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-7.0, 23.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at Position (-3.5, 23.5)
- Boiler at Position (-7.0, 23.5)
- Offshore Pump at Position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group connecting the offshore pump to the boiler

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Furnace 1 at Position (-14.0, -49.0)
- Furnace 2 at Position (-12.0, -48.0)
- Multiple Burner Inserters supplying coal and iron ore to the furnaces
- Wooden Chest at Position (-13.5, -46.5) storing iron plates
- Iron Chest at Position (-11.5, -44.5) storing iron plates
- Belt Group transporting materials between furnaces and chests

### Transport Belt Network
Consists of:
- Belts connecting various positions for material transport, including:
  - Belt from (x=-11.5, y=-46.5) to (x=-9.5, y=-46.5)
  - Belt from (x=-8.5, y=-45.5) to (x=-8.5, y=-43.5)
  - Belt from (x=-16.5, y=-49.5) to (x=-16.5, y=-47.5)
  - Belt from (x=-14.5, y=-45.5) to (x=-14.5, y=-47.5)
  - Belt from (x=-13.5, y=-46.5) to (x=-11.5, y=-46.5)
  - Belt from (x=-14.5, y=-45.5) to (x=-14.5, y=-43.5)
  - Belt from (x=-13.5, y=-45.5) to (x=-11.5, y=-45.5)

### Research Lab
- Lab with no research in progress

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors When Using Inserters
- Ensure that inserters have a clear path to both source and destination entities. Avoid placing items on the ground where they can block inserter operations.

### Errors Due to Lack of Source Items
- Make sure that the inserters have access to the necessary source items to function properly. Regularly check and replenish the source items for inserters.

### Errors When Inserting Items Without Inventory
- Verify that the required items are available in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace or any other entity.
